message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $9,500. I think this is a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really want to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $7,500 is too low for me.  How about we split the difference and agree on $8,750?
I understand your position, but $8,750 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8,200, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me in the middle?
